title: DSML Kazakhstan
subtitle: The hub for Data Science and Machine Learning enthusiasts in Kazakhstan
communityDescription: Join thousands of data scientists, machine learning engineers, and AI enthusiasts across Kazakhstan. Connect, learn, and grow together in our vibrant community.
discussionHubDescription: Main community chat for discussions, questions, and networking
newsFeedDescription: Latest news, events, and announcements from the community
dataJobsDescription: Job opportunities in data science, ML, and AI fields
itJobsDescription: General IT and tech job opportunities across Kazakhstan
youtubeChannelDescription: Educational content, talks, and event recordings
whatIsDsmlDescription: Learn about our community's mission, values, and the impact we're making in Kazakhstan's tech ecosystem.
collaborationSubtitle: We collaborate with companies, educational institutions, and organizations to advance the data science ecosystem in Kazakhstan.

mediaSupport.title: Media Support
mediaSupport.details: We provide media coverage for tech events, promote educational content, and help amplify important industry news across our community channels.

hiring.title: Talent Acquisition
hiring.description: Connect with top data science talent
hiring.details: Access our network of skilled data scientists, ML engineers, and AI specialists. We help companies find the right talent and professionals find great opportunities.

corporateTraining.title: Corporate Training
corporateTraining.details: We offer tailored training programs in data science, machine learning, and AI for corporate teams, helping organizations upskill their workforce.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.details: Our community experts provide consulting services for data science projects, ML implementations, and AI strategy development.

heroCallToAction: Ready to Join the Future of AI in Central Asia?
heroCallToActionDesc: Connect with like-minded professionals, learn from industry experts, and advance your career in data science and machine learning.
communityFirstDesc: We prioritize building meaningful connections and fostering collaboration among our members.
continuousLearningDesc: We believe in the power of continuous education and knowledge sharing to drive innovation.
careerGrowthDesc: We support our members' professional development and career advancement in the tech industry.
